name: Domina
description: Acquire, train, upgrade, and whip your brutish gladiators towards bloody victory in the ruthless arenas of ancient Rome.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.8 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated) Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Yes. Additional Notes: See Game Options > Quality
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 3 Ghz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated) Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Yes.
